1: %% This suite contains cases that cannot be written
    2: %% in Erlang itself and must be done via the abstract
    3: %% format.
    4: 
    5: -module(abstract_SUITE).
    6: 
    7: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    8: -include("dialyzer_test_constants.hrl").
    9: 
   10: -export([suite/0, all/0, init_per_suite/0, init_per_suite/1, end_per_suite/1]).
   11: -export([generated_case/1]).
   12: 
   13: suite() ->
   14:     [{timetrap, {minutes, 1}}].
   15: all() ->
   16:     [generated_case].
   17: 
   18: init_per_suite() ->
   19:   [{timetrap, ?plt_timeout}].
   20: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   21:   OutDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   22:   case dialyzer_common:check_plt(OutDir) of
   23:     fail -> {skip, "Plt creation/check failed."};
   24:     ok -> [{dialyzer_options, []}|Config]
   25:   end.
   26: 
   27: end_per_suite(_Config) ->
   28:     %% This function is required since init_per_suite/1 exists.
   29:     ok.
   30: 
   31: generated_case(Config) when is_list(Config) ->
   32:     %% Equivalent to:
   33:     %%
   34:     %% -module(foo).
   35:     %% -export(bar).
   36:     %% bar() ->
   37:     %%     Arg = sample,
   38:     %%     case Arg of
   39:     %%         #{} -> map;
   40:     %%         _ -> Arg:fn()
   41:     %%     end.
   42:     %%
   43:     %% Except the case statement and its clauses are marked as autogenerated.
   44:     [] =
   45: 	test([{attribute,1,module,foo},
   46: 	      {attribute,2,export,[{bar,0}]},
   47: 	      {function,3,bar,0,
   48: 	       [{clause,3,[],[],
   49: 		 [{match,4,{var,4,'Arg'},{atom,4,sample}},
   50: 		  {'case',[{location,5},{generated,true}],{var,5,'Arg'},
   51: 		   [{clause,[{location,6},{generated,true}],[{map,6,[]}],[],
   52: 		     [{atom,6,map}]},
   53: 		    {clause,[{location,7},{generated,true}],[{var,7,'_'}],[],
   54: 		     [{call,7,{remote,7,{var,7,'Arg'},{atom,7,fn}},[]}]}]}]}]}],
   55: 	     Config, [], []),
   56:     %% With the first clause not auto-generated
   57:     [{warn_matching,{_,6},_}] =
   58: 	test([{attribute,1,module,foo},
   59: 	      {attribute,2,export,[{bar,0}]},
   60: 	      {function,3,bar,0,
   61: 	       [{clause,3,[],[],
   62: 		 [{match,4,{var,4,'Arg'},{atom,4,sample}},
   63: 		  {'case',[{location,5},{generated,true}],{var,5,'Arg'},
   64: 		   [{clause,6,[{map,6,[]}],[],
   65: 		     [{atom,6,map}]},
   66: 		    {clause,[{location,7},{generated,true}],[{var,7,'_'}],[],
   67: 		     [{call,7,{remote,7,{var,7,'Arg'},{atom,7,fn}},[]}]}]}]}]}],
   68: 	     Config, [], []),
   69:     %% With Arg set to [] so neither clause matches
   70:     [W = {warn_return_no_exit,{_,3},_},
   71:      {warn_matching,{_,6},_},
   72:      {warn_failing_call,{_,7},_}] =
   73: 	test([{attribute,1,file, {"fileName.erl",1}},
   74:               {attribute,1,module,foo},
   75: 	      {attribute,2,export,[{bar,0}]},
   76: 	      {function,3,bar,0,
   77: 	       [{clause,3,[],[],
   78: 		 [{match,4,{var,4,'Arg'},{nil,4}},
   79: 		  {'case',[{location,5},{generated,true}],{var,5,'Arg'},
   80: 		   [{clause,[{location,6},{generated,true}],[{map,6,[]}],[],
   81: 		     [{atom,6,map}]},
   82: 		    {clause,[{location,7},{generated,true}],[{var,7,'_'}],[],
   83: 		     [{call,7,{remote,7,{var,7,'Arg'},{atom,7,fn}},[]}]}]}]}]}],
   84: 	     Config, [], []),
   85:     %% Location is a line (no column):
   86:     "fileName.erl:3: Function bar/0 has no local return\n" =
   87:         dialyzer:format_warning(W),
   88:     ok.
   89: 
   90: test(Prog0, Config, COpts, DOpts) ->
   91:     Prog = erl_parse:anno_from_term(Prog0),
   92:     {ok, BeamFile} = compile(Config, Prog, COpts),
   93:     run_dialyzer(Config, succ_typings, [BeamFile], DOpts).
   94: 
   95: compile(Config, Prog, CompileOpts) ->
   96:     OutDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
   97:     Opts = [{outdir, OutDir}, debug_info, return_errors | CompileOpts],
   98:     {ok, Module, Source} = compile:forms(Prog, Opts),
   99:     BeamFile = filename:join([OutDir, lists:concat([Module, ".beam"])]),
  100:     ok = file:write_file(BeamFile, Source),
  101:     {ok, BeamFile}.
  102: 
  103: run_dialyzer(Config, Analysis, Files, Opts) ->
  104:     OutDir = ?config(priv_dir, Config),
  105:     PltFilename = dialyzer_common:plt_file(OutDir),
  106:     dialyzer:run([{analysis_type, Analysis},
  107: 		  {files, Files},
  108: 		  {init_plt, PltFilename},
  109: 		  {check_plt, false},
  110: 		  {from, byte_code} |
  111: 		  Opts]).
